class.name: Rect2
class.brief_description: 2D axis-aligned bounding box using floating point coordinates.
class.description: [Rect2] consists of a position, a size, and several utility functions. It is typically used for fast overlap tests. It uses floating-point coordinates. If you need integer coordinates, use [Rect2i] instead. The 3D counterpart to [Rect2] is [AABB].

method.name: Rect2
method.description: Constructs a [Rect2] by position and size.

method.name: Rect2
method.description: Constructs a [Rect2] by x, y, width, and height.

method.name: abs
method.description: Returns a [Rect2] with equivalent position and area, modified so that the top-left corner is the origin and [code]width[/code] and [code]height[/code] are positive.

method.name: clip
method.description: Returns the intersection of this [Rect2] and b.

method.name: encloses
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if this [Rect2] completely encloses another one.

method.name: expand
method.description: Returns this [Rect2] expanded to include a given point.

method.name: grow
method.description: Returns a copy of the [Rect2] grown a given amount of units towards all the sides.

method.name: grow_individual
method.description: Returns a copy of the [Rect2] grown a given amount of units towards each direction individually.

method.name: grow_margin
method.description: Returns a copy of the [Rect2] grown a given amount of units towards the [enum Margin] direction.

method.name: has_no_area
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the [Rect2] is flat or empty.

method.name: has_point
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the [Rect2] contains a point.

method.name: intersects
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the [Rect2] overlaps with [code]b[/code] (i.e. they have at least one point in common). If [code]include_borders[/code] is [code]true[/code], they will also be considered overlapping if their borders touch, even without intersection.

method.name: is_equal_approx
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if this [Rect2] and [code]rect[/code] are approximately equal, by calling [code]is_equal_approx[/code] on each component.

method.name: merge
method.description: Returns a larger [Rect2] that contains this [Rect2] and [code]b[/code].

members.member: Ending corner. This is calculated as [code]position + size[/code]. Setting this value will change the size.
Beginning corner. Typically has values lower than [member end].
Size from [member position] to [member end]. Typically all components are positive. If the size is negative, you can use [method abs] to fix it.
